content:
I currently manage my tasks and time using a combination of Todoist and my calendar. I prioritize my tasks based on their urgency and importance, and try to allocate specific time blocks for each task. However, I find it challenging to balance my leadership responsibilities with my technical tasks and personal life. I often feel like I'm being pulled in different directions and struggle to focus on a single task for an extended period.

The tip that resonates with me the most is learning to say no. I tend to take on too much and overcommit myself, which leads to burnout and decreased productivity. I need to improve my ability to delegate tasks and set clear boundaries with my team and stakeholders.
